member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Intentions.CSharp.QuickFixes.CSharpScopedRemoveRedundantCodeQuickFixBase
member.summary: Base class for scoped redundancy removal quick-fixes participating in code cleanup, which highlightings can be emitted without full daemon run.
member.remarks:
Reimplements in order to directly call when executing as part of scoped execution and hence without messing up with actions on text control.
Implements in order to have additional bulb items "Remove redundant code in file/project/solution".

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Intentions.CSharp.Util.PsiUtil.FindLoopWhereHeaderContains(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.CSharp.Tree.ICSharpTreeNode)
member.summary: Checks whether expression is directly or indirectly (lambda) embedded inside loop header.
member.returns: Returns loop that contains expression in its header
